Posts.Title: CALLING ALL STAGE I SISTERS sheila888 MCBaker

Posts.Content: Nov 16, 2009 09:18PM - edited Nov 16, 2009 09:19PM by Jan1 What a great thread.  I think I am stage 1 or 0 or 0.5 who knows?   A wonderful lady here Beesie stated that I was stage 1 with a letter after it.   I had DCIS with microinvasion, multicentric,  grade 3.   I had right sided mx due to the multiple areas of cancer.  I am in my 11th month of the "immediate" reconstruction.    I may just lurk for awhile, but really do enjoy reading your posts.  Thanks. Jan
Posts.Title: CALLING ALL STAGE I SISTERS sheila888 MCBaker

Posts.Content: Aug 24, 2009 12:00PM Jan1 wrote: Heidi, prayers being said and if it is any comfort, I did social work for 25 years, please, never believe a prognois of time regarding life expectancy, unless the Dr. has crystal balls, pun intended!  There is only one unique you, and you are a fighter!   Your will to live is the greatest strength in your ability to kick this cancers butt.  Your family and friends supporting you emotionally, physically and spiritually, along with the best medical care are your best treatment plan for beating this.    Jan
Posts.Title: Heidi Update-it isn't pretty Heidi_Ho zeeka71

Posts.Content: Jun 22, 2011 03:43PM Jan1 wrote: Hi Everyone, I just got an email from Vivie and the surgery was a success!  She asked me to post for her, she will log in when she is able to.   NO LYMPH NODE involvement, that is the best news ever.  She stated she was eating dinner and I am so happy that this part of the journey is over for her.  Way to go Vivie, you are my hero. Jan
